Name: Strange Computer
Tooltip: This tooltip is a message... and part of a system of messages... pay attention to it!
Sending this message was important to us. We considered ourselves to be a powerful culture.
This item is not an item of honor... no highly esteemed functionality is commemorated here... nothing valued is here.
What is here was dangerous and repulsive to us. This message is a warning about danger.
The danger is in a particular item... it increases towards a center... the center of danger is here... of a particular size and shape, and below your cursor.
The danger is still present, in your time, as it was in ours.
The danger is to the game, and it can crash.
The form of the danger is an emanation of projectiles.
The danger is unleashed only if you substantially disturb this item physically. This item is best shunned and left unequipped.
Side effects include universal instability, eternalism, sticky fingers, hallucination, and premature ejaculation
